info.name: GitStake API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for GitStake - Advanced GitHub Analytics & Developer Recognition Platform with Dual AI System and Deep Search Capabilities

request.description: Get API documentation and available endpoints

item.name: User Analytics

request.description: Get all analyzed users with pagination
Get user's comprehensive analytics summary with developer level, insights, and detailed metrics
Comprehensive GitHub user analysis with 50+ metrics, detailed data collections, developer level assessment, and AI insights
Delete user data from the system

query.description: Options: proficiencyScore, totalCommits, repoCount, totalPRs, streak.longest, innovationScore, collaborationScore

request.description: Multi-metric leaderboard with developer levels and comprehensive ranking

item.description: User analytics and management with comprehensive GitHub analysis and developer progression

request.description: Get users that the user is following

item.name: Advanced Analytics

request.description: Get code complexity analysis for user
Comprehensive activity analytics with developer level, time patterns, and trend analysis
Detailed collaboration metrics including cross-repo contributions and community engagement
Comprehensive code quality analysis with commit patterns and improvement suggestions
Detailed trend analysis with predictive insights and growth trajectory

item.description: Advanced analytics with comprehensive metrics, predictions, and developer insights

request.description: Get GitHub API rate limit status

item.name: AI Chat Assistant (Standard)

request.description: Ask GitStake AI Assistant for platform-specific guidance with human-like responses
Ask about GitStake developer level progression system
Get advice on improving code quality and proficiency scores
Check standard AI assistant service health

item.description: Standard AI chat assistant for GitStake platform-specific guidance

item.name: Deep Search AI (Web-Enhanced)

request.description: Perform web search and get AI-enhanced human-like response with sources
Search for development topics with enhanced context and best practices
Search for specific programming language information and tutorials
Get general overview of a programming language
Search for GitHub and open source related topics
Get guidance on open source contribution
Search for current technology trends and developments
Check deep search AI service health status

item.description: Web-enhanced AI assistant with real-time search capabilities and source attribution

item.name: Quest System

request.description: Generate a new quest for specific developer level using AI
Generate quests for all 8 developer levels for the current week
Get all active quests, optionally filtered by developer level
Get quest details by quest ID
Stake user for a quest during staking period (wallet address optional)
Submit solution for a quest during challenge period
Get quest leaderboard with rankings and scores
Get user's quest participation history with pagination
Update quest statuses based on schedule (admin/cron)
Process quest results and determine winners (admin)
Bulk process all quests in closed status (admin)
Update user's wallet address for crypto rewards
Get crypto reward rates for all developer levels

item.description: AI-powered quest system with difficulty-scaled challenges and crypto rewards for all 8 developer levels

item.name: Cron Job Management

request.description: Get status of all cron jobs (running/stopped)
Manually trigger weekly quest generation for all 8 levels
Manually trigger quest results processing with crypto rewards

item.description: Automated cron job management for quest lifecycle
